nodes.text: Khresh was a Chiss male who served as Senior Captain in the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet aboard the Steadfast. While the Steadfast served as the flagship of Admiral Ar'alani, Khresh served as her first officer.
Kresh's Chiss family was rivaled with that of Mid Commander Tanik.
Khresh appeared as a minor character in the 2019 novel Thrawn: Treason by Timothy Zahn.
